alert.note: Alert for Gibson; Posey (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 02 at 8:19PM EST until January 12 at 2:30AM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following river in Indiana...Illinois... Wabash River at New Harmony. .Recent heavy rains in the Wabash River basin have caused a rise in the river, which will result in a week or more of minor flooding at New Harmony. For the Wabash River...including New Harmony...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH WEDNESDAY, JANUARY 12... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wabash River at New Harmony. * WHEN...Until Wednesday, January 12. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, The river overflows low ground on the Illinois side. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:30 PM CST Sunday the stage was 14.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 16.8 feet early Saturday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Tuesday, January 11. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
